item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. TypeScript types can run DOOM [video] (458 points | 110 comments)
2. Show HN: LLM plays Pokémon (open sourced) (29 points | 4 comments)
3. Launch HN: Maritime Fusion (YC W25) – Fusion Reactors for Ships (81 points | 94 comments)

5. Skopje’s eccentric post office (2021) (24 points | 3 comments)

7. DARPA Large Bio-Mechanical Space Structures (77 points | 29 comments)
8. Show HN: A Database Written in Golang (129 points | 42 comments)

11. The FFT Strikes Back: An Efficient Alternative to Self-Attention (318 points | 117 comments)

13. Alexa+ (116 points | 152 comments)

23. Living in your programming environment [pdf] (30 points | 6 comments)
24. Securing tomorrow's software: the need for memory safety standards (11 points | 3 comments)
25. Telescope – an open-source web-based log viewer for logs stored in ClickHouse (147 points | 56 comments)
26. DeepGEMM: clean and efficient FP8 GEMM kernels with fine-grained scaling (374 points | 64 comments)
27. Your camera can take 3D photos. Your screen can display 3D photos. (67 points | 66 comments)
28. Claude Plays Pokémon (21 points | 4 comments)
